toolkit.name: SamplePacketLiveSource
toolkit.description: Sample applications that illustrate use of the PacketLiveSource operator.

type.name: PacketType
type.type: uint64 packetsReceived, uint64 packetsDropped, uint64 packetsProcessed, uint64 bytesProcessed, float64 metricsIntervalElapsed, uint64 metricsIntervalPacketsReceived, uint64 metricsIntervalPacketsDropped, uint64 metricsIntervalPacketsProcessed, uint64 metricsIntervalBytesProcessed, boolean metricsUpdated, uint32 CAPTURE_SECONDS, uint32 CAPTURE_MICROSECONDS, list<uint8>[6] ETHER_SRC_ADDRESS, list<uint8>[6] ETHER_DST_ADDRESS, rstring ETHER_SRC_ADDRESS_AS_STRING, rstring ETHER_DST_ADDRESS_AS_STRING, uint16 ETHER_PROTOCOL, rstring VLAN_TAGS, uint8 IP_VERSION, uint8 IP_PROTOCOL, uint32 IPV4_SRC_ADDRESS, uint32 IPV4_DST_ADDRESS, rstring IPV4_SRC_ADDRESS_AS_STRING, rstring IPV4_DST_ADDRESS_AS_STRING, list<uint8>[16] IPV6_SRC_ADDRESS, list<uint8>[16] IPV6_DST_ADDRESS, rstring IPV6_SRC_ADDRESS_AS_STRING, rstring IPV6_DST_ADDRESS_AS_STRING, uint16 IP_SRC_PORT, uint16 IP_DST_PORT, boolean UDP_PORT_53, uint16 UDP_SRC_PORT, uint16 UDP_DST_PORT, boolean TCP_PORT_80, uint16 TCP_SRC_PORT, uint16 TCP_DST_PORT, uint32 TCP_SEQUENCE, uint32 TCP_ACKNOWLEDGEMENT, boolean TCP_FLAGS_URGENT, boolean TCP_FLAGS_ACK, boolean TCP_FLAGS_PUSH, boolean TCP_FLAGS_RESET, boolean TCP_FLAGS_SYN, boolean TCP_FLAGS_FIN, uint16 TCP_WINDOW, rstring JMIRROR_SRC_ADDRESS_AS_STRING, rstring JMIRROR_DST_ADDRESS_AS_STRING, uint16 JMIRROR_SRC_PORT, uint16 JMIRROR_DST_PORT, uint32 JMIRROR_INTERCEPT_ID, uint32 JMIRROR_SESSION_ID, rstring ERSPAN_SRC_ADDRESS_AS_STRING, rstring ERSPAN_DST_ADDRESS_AS_STRING, uint32 PACKET_LENGTH, uint32 PAYLOAD_LENGTH, blob PACKET_DATA, blob PAYLOAD_DATA

type.name: PacketType
type.type: uint64 packetNumber, float64 captureTime, uint8 ipVersion, rstring ipProtocol, rstring ipSourceAddress, uint16 ipSourcePort, rstring ipDestinationAddress, uint16 ipDestinationPort, uint32 packetLength, uint32 payloadLength, blob packetData, blob payloadData

type.name: MetricsType
type.type: float64 metricsTime, boolean metricsUpdated, uint64 packetNumber, uint64 packetsReceived, uint64 packetsDropped, uint64 packetsProcessed, uint64 bytesProcessed, float64 intervalElapsed, uint64 intervalPacketsReceived, uint64 intervalPacketsDropped, uint64 intervalPacketsProcessed, uint64 intervalBytesProcessed

type.name: DHCPPacketType
type.type: uint64 packetNumber, float64 captureTime, rstring etherSourceAddress, rstring etherDestinationAddress, rstring ipSourceAddress, rstring ipDestinationAddress, uint32 dhcpLength, blob dhcpMessage

type.name: DNSPacketType
type.type: uint64 packetNumber, float64 captureTime, rstring ipSourceAddress, rstring ipDestinationAddress, uint32 dnsLength, blob dnsMessage

type.name: HTTPPacketType
type.type: uint64 packetNumber, float64 captureTime, rstring ipSourceAddress, rstring ipDestinationAddress, uint32 httpLength, blob httpData

type.name: MetricsType
type.type: float64 metricsTime, boolean metricsUpdated, float64 averagePacketsReceived, float64 averagePacketsDropped, float64 averagePacketsProcessed, float64 averageBytesProcessed

type.name: AllPacketType
type.type: uint64 packetNumber, float64 captureTime, uint8 ipVersion, rstring ipProtocol, rstring ipSourceAddress, uint16 ipSourcePort, rstring ipDestinationAddress, uint16 ipDestinationPort, uint32 payloadLength, uint32 packetLength, blob packetData

type.name: PacketType
type.type: uint64 packetNumber, uint64 packetsProcessed, uint64 bytesProcessed, float64 captureTime, uint8 ipVersion, rstring ipProtocol, rstring ipSourceAddress, uint16 ipSourcePort, rstring ipDestinationAddress, uint16 ipDestinationPort, uint32 packetLength, uint32 payloadLength, blob packetData, blob payloadData

type.name: PacketType
type.type: uint32 captureTimeAsSeconds, uint64 captureTimeAsMilliseconds, uint64 captureTimeAsMicroseconds, float64 captureTimeAsFloat, timestamp captureTimeAsTimestamp, uint64 partitionKey, int8 packetNumberModulo13, int32 packetLength, int32 packetCaptureLength, int32 packetHeaderLength, int32 packetPayloadLength
